snippet: The Los Angeles City Council voted Tuesday to repeal the ban on medical marijuana dispensaries that it passed in July.
abstract: Los Angeles City Council votes to repeal the ban on medical marijuana dispensaries that it passed in July.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles City Council voted Tuesday to repeal the ban on medical marijuana dispensaries that it passed in July.

headline.main: California: Council Reverses Ban on Marijuana Shops
headline.print_headline: California: Council Reverses Ban On Marijuana Shops
